name: Mirror Monster
description:
Show me your Monster Skills and make the human believe your moves!

Copy the poses of the human to not get discovered!

CONTROLS:

  • Rotations Buttons or
  • 'w' and 'd' rotates the Right Arm
  • 'left arrow' and 'right arrow' rotate the Left Arm
  • Good Luck my little monster!

Please comment any bug or suggestions!

hugs and scary moves!
